Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Houston in 2008...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 5/30/2009 (Going to HOU: P S. Linebrink, P T. Lilly. Going to PIT: 1B A. Dykstra, SS E. Andrus, P K. Millwood)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 2/12/2012 (Going to HOU: 1B A. Dykstra, C C. Tankersley, P C. Reitsma. Going to PIT: P C. Volstad, C A. Hedges, P N. Grajeda)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/2012, off Justin Duchscherer (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/2012, off Byung-hyun Kim (PIT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/17/2015, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Atlanta on 6/23/2019 (Going to ATL: 1B A. Dykstra, P J. Petties. Going to HOU: LF T. Jackson, RF J. Schafer, RF B. Lewis Jr.)...
Injured on 9/24/2019 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/12/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
